page.description: Returns a count of the number of ways a pattern matched a string (0 for none, 1 for one condition matched, 2 for two conditions matched etc.
page.syntax: Percentage as N = TEXTSEARCHSCORE(C string,C search_pattern)

argument.name: search_pattern
argument.description: The character string to examine for occurrences of Find_String.

page.discussion: Returns the number of phrases in string found in search_pattern as a percentage. Search is case insensitive.
page.example: textsearchscore("now is the time for all good men", "time AND bad") -> 0, since one was matched, but not both . textsearchscore("now is the time for all good men", "time OR bad") -> .5, since 50%, were matched textsearchscore("now is the time for all good men", "time AND good") -> 1, since both, or 100%, were matched textsearchscore("now is the time for all good men", "time OR good") -> 1, since both were matched
